          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Part 3 - Further Education</string>
            <string language="en">Part 3 - Further Education</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Teil 3 - Aufbauendere Ausbildung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Partie 3 - Une Éducation Plus permanente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parte 3 - Instrução Mais adicional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parte 3 - Educazione Più permanente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρος 3 - μεταδευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Parte 3 - Enseñanza superior</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you can learn more about further education in the U.K.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can learn more about further education in the UK Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 6 - What Would You Like?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>

          </keyword>
          <structure>

            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie mehr über aufbauendere 
Ausbildung im BRITISCHEN Safir erlernen - Englisch und Berufsleben 
für Anfänger - Modul 6 - was wurden Sie mögen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez apprendre plus au sujet 
d'une éducation plus permanente dans le Safir BRITANNIQUE - l'anglais
et vie active pour des débutants - le module 6 - que aimez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode aprender mais sobre uma 
instrução mais adicional no Safir BRITÂNICO - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - o módulo 6 - que  você gosta?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete imparare più circa l'educazione più 
permanente nel Safir BRITANNICO - inglese e vita attiva per i 
principianti - modulo 6 - che cosa gradite?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να μάθετε περισσότερους για τη 
μεταδευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση στο UK Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 6 - τι θα 
θέλατε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Aquí usted puede aprender más sobre la 
enseñanza superior en el Safir BRITÁNICO - inglés y vida laboral 
para los principiantes - el módulo 6 - qué  usted tiene gusto?</string>
          </description>
